operations with area collections
[area for interpolation (area)]


Functions

bool surfit::areas_delall ()
 removes all areas from surfit_areas collection
bool surfit::areas_del (int pos)
 removes area from surfit_areas collection at 'pos' position
bool surfit::areas_read (const char *filename, const char *areaname, REAL value=undef_value, int columns=2, int col1=1, int col2=2, const char *delimiter=" ", int grow_by=250)
 reads area from formatted text file and adds it to surfit_areas collection
bool surfit::areas_load (const char *filename, const char *areaname=NULL)
 reads area from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_areas collection
area * surfit::areas_at (int pos)
 returns area at 'pos' position in surfit_areas collection
area * surfit::areas_first ()
 returns first area in surfit_areas collection
area * surfit::areas_last ()
 returns last area in surfit_areas collection
int surfit::areas_size ()
 returns amount of elements in surfit_areas collection
int surfit::areas_info ()
 prints information about all areas in surfit_areas collection
